title: The Truth of bronze/silver ELO hell
body: Half of yall are high as a kite. Blazed boys/smurfs seeing how far they can get up in ranked munching on some Doritos. They won't even hide it, if your wondering why your team always has a solid 2 that seem brain dead and dont respond to the map or mass pings just ask and they usually start talking about how much they had and what they're eating.

replies.body: I wouldn't worry about it too much mate, Intoxicants are for the weak minded, Just let them be.

You do know that us people who wanna climb ALWAYS get stuck with them right?
Or did you just forget its 5 a team?
The enemy team have those people aswell. Stop playing the victim card.
